DOC.detailed_description: We study whether cinnamon bark water-soluble cinnamon could effective nutraceutical initial treatment diabetes compare standard therapy metformin 1000 mg ( extended-release ) . This study enroll 309 subject type 2 diabetic ( use American Diabetes Association criterion ) hypoglycemic medication . Subjects randomize one three group , group 1 receive oral extended-release Metformin 1000mg , group 2 receive Cinnamon Bark 1000mg , group 3 receive cinnulin PF 500mg . Subjects instruct take study pill day 90 days.After 90 day treatment , subject hemoglobin A1C , lipid panel , height , weight , blood pressure waist circumference measure . Analysis describe use intention-to-treat principle miss data use ( use carry-forward method impute miss data ) . Subjects bring remain medication determine adherence rate study protocol .
